original_title: Mickey Mouse in Living Color Disc 1
overview: This set covers the first leg of Mickey Mouse's color career, from 1935 to 1938.  1935  The Band Concert  Mickey's Garden  On Ice  Pluto's Judgement Day  Mickey's Fire Brigade  1936  Thru the Mirror  Mickey's Circus  Mickey's Elephant  Mickey's Grand Opera  Mickey's Polo Team  Alpine Climbers  Moving Day  Mickey's Rival  Orphans' Picnic  Bonus features  Parade of the Award Nominees (1932), a short made especially for the Academy Awards show  Pencil-test versions of Mickey's Fire Brigade, Pluto's Judgment Day and On Ice  Easter Egg: A clip from the Disneyland story appears as an Easter egg on this disc, it shows Disney talking about Mickey's creation reminding us that it all started with a mouse.
title: Mickey Mouse in Living Color Disc 1
